import React from 'react' import styles from './ReactBar.module.css' import {AiTwotoneHeart} from 'react-icons/ai' import {IoMdShareAlt} from 'react-icons/io' import {BsFillChatDotsFill} from 'react-icons/bs' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { likePost } from '../../store/actions/postAction' const ReactBar = ({id}) => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const {auth} = useSelector(state=>state); const likeHandler = () => { dispatch(likePost(auth,id)) } return (
Like
Comment
Share
) } export default ReactBar
